name: Super Mario 127
description:
Super Mario 127 is a fan sequel to Super Mario 63, which combines elements from multiple different 3D Mario games into a 2D experience. It also includes a powerful level editor, with plans to have online sharing and custom campaigns in the future.

Join the discord server to share custom levels, participate in monthly Level Designer Contests, give feedback, and more! https://discord.gg/qgfErCy
